sentences.sContent: The ticket is valid until March.
sentences.sCn: 这张票的有效期一直到 3 月份。

sentences.sContent: He waited until she had finished speaking.
Until recently, Anna worked as a teacher in Japan.
sentences.sCn: 直到最近，安娜一直在日本当老师。

sentences.sContent: Up until last year, they didn’t even own a car.
sentences.sCn: 一直到去年，他们连汽车也没有。

trans.tranOther: if something happens until a particular time, it continues and then stops at that time
